title: Analysis for improving the user engagement on a data-accuracy tool

for.name: For The World Bank Institute, innovative Labs

tasks: to motivate citizen in volunteering for correcting wrong geo-localized data
projectDescription: I was contacted by Richard Murby to advice his team on a building an online community to help correcting wrong geo-localized data collected by several NGOs in 3 African countries.
Together with Dmitry Zaviralov, Johannes Kiess and Qiyang Xu, we ran several brainstorming sessions to identify the challenges and the potentials associated with the project.
I synthesized our findings and advised them accordingly for the next steps of the development.
